subject: CNN Alerts: bush

CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
ID cards of missing soldiers shown on insurgent Web site

06/04/07 09:27 AM, EDT
A Sunni insurgent group on Monday posted video of the military identification cards of two missing American soldiers in Iraq.
FULL STORY
